title: anda nAL
sahitya:
anda nAL ini varumO shollaDi ambala paingiLiyE


anupallavi

  endenda vELaiyum idayattil padam vaittE irukkirEn enravan kUttADum


caraNam    tanjam pughundavarait-tAnguvaden bhAram taLarAmal un anbu vaLaruvadE dhIram
'anjal anjal' enrE abhayamaLittu shuddhAnandanai INDu tAnAkki yANDiDum
